text:
Jab bhi meri cycle le jaata hai, cycle ki chabhi kabhi vapas dene nahi aata, hamesha mujhe hi maangne aana padta tha, aur cycle ki chabhi bed ke neeche padi malti thi.
Itna bada vala hai tu, har jagah maje lene pahuch jaata tha, pehle to ek dam deep deep baaten karega aur samne vala insaan bhavnaon me beh jaata tha, phir bolta tha aaj ke liye itte maje kafi hain aur kat leta tha vahan se phir.
First year me jab sath rehte the, to tera hamesha ek hi naatak hota tha.. 12 baj gaye, light band karo, bc pure wing me sabse jyada ladaiyan hamare hi room me huyi hain
Aur apne psychology ke discussions yaad hain, puri raat chalte the, deep and intellectual discussions.. kabhi kabhi to lagta tha apunich bhagwan hai.
Fest me bhai apan ne sath milke kitni ladkiyan taadi hain ( 3 o’clock, 9 o’clock ), ladkiyon  ke group me baat karne gaya tha aur sab tere upar has rahi thin. 
Yaad hai tujhe.. sath baith ke porn dekh rhe hote the aur phir mere se bolta tha ki abhi tu bahar jaa, mere se control nahi ho raha, aur apan ne quarantine ke 7 din me 14 baar hilane ki shart bhi lagayi thi and ofcouse tune hi sabse jyada hilaya hoga, mai to 2 din me hi beemar pad gaya tha aur phir agle kai din tak nhi hila paya tha
Aur teri horror movies dekhne me to fat jati hai, ek baar conjuring dekh rahe the sath baith ke, aur tu mera hath pakad ke baitha tha, aur jaise hi daravana scene aaya, teri itni fat gayi ki tune apne naakhun gada diye the mere hath pe. Aur bhai summers me ‘haunting of the hill house’ dekhne me to ham dono ki hi fat gayi thi.
Aur vo to mast din tha.. jab apan rave moti me tanha ji movie dekhne gaye the, aur momos bhi khaye the, uss din kafi maje kiye the apan ne
Ab ek dil ki baat batata hun.. I like your nature, hamesha mast rehne vala insaan hai tu, kabhi koi emotional chutiyape nahi hote tere sath, kabhi jyada nhi sochta tu.. always chill and cheerful, koi moh maaya nahi. mai to tere se bilkul opposite hun.. emotional, serious aur har cheej me jyada sochne vala aur kisi bhi ladki se pyaar ho jata hai mujhe. Mai hamesha tere jaisa banna chahta tha but slowly I realized that we are different aur shayad isiliye aaj ham itne close hain ek doosre ke. Apan ghanto tak ladki patane ke upar baate karte rehte the and I hope ki mera diye huye gyan se tu khoob saari ladkiyaan pataye aur charam sukh ko prapt kare.
Bahut si bakchodiyan Karin hai sath me, bahut si baaten share ki hain, aur aage bhi karte rahenge. Tere sath baat karke hamesha hi maja aata hai.. Thanks bro for everything and for being with me, mera ashirvad tere sath hai.. bhagwan kare teri saari fantasies puri hon, LOVE YOU BABY! ( PS: Ye mess ka khana acha kyun nahi ho raha hai, upar se bdmr bhi 50 ke upar jaa raha hai, tumko mess secy kaun banaya.. gaanja phook ke pade rehte ho, kuch jimmedari banti hai tumhari ki nahi )
author: Amitesh  Sachan

text: Khandu mere bhai.. Rakhi ke bandhan ko nibhana, yaad hai first year me maine tere rakhi baandhi thi aur tune mujhe ice cream khilayi thi. Rakhi ne ham dono ko ek rishte me baandh diya and I wish ki hamara bond aise hi hamesha strong bana rahe. Ham dono to badminton me bhi ek jaisa khelte hain but tera jeet ka junoon ultra level pe hota hai aur jab shot miss ho jata tha to tu jameen pe hi let jaata tha, tu acha khelta hai.. bas thodi power kam lagaya kar aur service out mat maara kar. Ladkiyon se baat karne ki kafi advise di hai maine.. ab mera ashirvad le le.. vijayi bhava! Bahut si bakchodiyan Karin hai sath me, bahut si baaten share ki hain, aur aage bhi karte rahenge. Tere sath baath karke hamesha hi acha lagta hai.. it means a lot, it helps a lot. Thanks bro for everything, for being with me, phir milenge bahut hi jaldi and take care and chaapu to tu bachpan se hi hai, aage bhi chapte rehna.               LOVE YOU BRO!
author: Amitesh  Sachan

text: I remember char saal pehle, ek mota sa ladka rehta tha B-222 me jo kisi ki baat nahi sunta tha, hamesha apne man ki hi karta tha, chahe kitna bhi koi kuch bol le, uske paas hamesha counter hota tha, god level confidence and god level chaapu. He has always been strong but jab college se sab aa rahe the tab maine usko pehli baar rote huye dekha, and trust me.. rote huye tu bahut funny lagta hai but pyaar bhi aa jata hai phir. Apan ne kafi movies dekhi hain sath baith ke, kafi bakchodiyan kari hain, tujhe cards khelna sikhaya hamne aur phir tu mujhe hi nahi khelne deta tha. I like your attitude, your confidence and I’ve learnt so much from you. You have always helped me and trust me, jab bhi mujhe kisi cheej ki jaroorat hoti hai.. sabse pehle tera hi naam dimaag me aata hai and you’ve always been there for me. Pareshan to bahut kiya hai tune, meri cycle leke chala jaata tha aur mai paidal hi jaa raha hota tha. Tujhe badminton khelte huye dekh kar bahut maja aata tha. Tujhe patle hone ki jaroorat nahi hai, tu apna penguin hai. I’m thankful ki tu mujhe mila, we had a great time together aur aage bhi hamesha sath rahenge. Jaldi hi milne aaunga aur jitne bhi tune mujhe thappad maare hain naa, sabka badla lunga. LOVE YOU DHEP!
author: Amitesh  Sachan

text: Sabse pehle ham TA202 ki lab me mile the, we worked together in that project and dheere dheere ham kafi ache dost ban gaye, tere sath kaam karte huye hamesha maja aata tha, obviously, you helped a lot and phir UOP ki lab me hamne bahut maje kiye the. Tu bahut acha insaan hai aur hamesha help kar deta hai. All the best for your upcoming future, chaapu to tu hai hai aur aage bhi chaapte rehna, phir milenge.. LOVE YOU BRO!
author: Amitesh  Sachan

text: I remember our long talks, night-outs, classes, assignments, exams and everything. Har cheej me tune meri help kari hai. Plagiarism ka dar bhi hota tha par phir bhi tu assignments de deta tha apne, aur bolta tha ki thoda change karke likhna, hamara luck acha tha kabhi fase nahi. Teri vajah se hi mere kitne courses paar ho gaye. NCL aur Library me apan ne kafi nightout maare hain aur jab free hote the to room pe hi baate karte karte night out maar lete the. Teri vajah se hi mai apna acedemics sambhal paaya, aur agar kabhi man pareshan hota tha, to tere se hi baat karke mai khud ko sambhal paaya. 8 baje ki class ke liye tujhe uthane aata tha, par kabhi kabhi bhool bhi jaata tha, I know I’ve been careless many times and I feel sorry for that. You are one of those jinhone mujhe hamesha sahi raste ki taraf guide kiya hai, kafi kuch seekha hai tere se. bakchodi karne me to bahut aage ho tum, apan fest me aur hall me bakchodiyan karte rehte the, aur tu serious bhi ho jata hai kabhi.. kafi sensible hoti hain teri baaten. Kuch aisi hi khatti meethi yaadhon se bhara hua hai apna sath aur hamesha apan sath rahenge. Tu bahut acha insaan hai aur sabki help karta hai, aise hi rehna. Baaki Tu to Kanpur ki hai, apan paas paas hi rehte hain, jaldi hi milenge aur bakchodi karenge. Chaapu to tu hai hi, aur mujhe pata hai aage bhi chaapta rahega, best wishes for you.. LOVE YOU DARLING!
author: Amitesh  Sachan

text: Abhi jyada kuch bolne ki jaroorat to hai nahi mujhe.. pehle hi ek baar poori pdf likh ke bhej chuka hun if u remember. Techkriti ka time to memories se bhara hua hai, kaam, masti, canteen and so much more. Cheerful insaan hai tu.. aise hi rehna. Best wishes for you!
author: Amitesh  Sachan

text: Typing speed kahan tak pahunchi.. first year me apan sab sath me kafi maje karte the, tere sath baat karke maja aata tha aur teri gurukul ki kahaniyan bhi mast hoti thin. Tere jaisa ek dam seedha sada bhola bhala bachcha koi aur nahi dekha, tujhe ham sab kafi pareshan karte the aur jab tu gussa bhi karta tha naa, to tu gusse me bhi itna bhola lagta hai ki hame kabhi bura nahi laga ulta pyaar hi aa jata tha. Ab to Jio me job lag gayi hai teri to Jio ka pack free me dilva diya karna and gaming karte rehna, chaapu to tu hai hi aur Jahan bhi jaana, chapte rehna. Best wishes for you. Jaldi milenge.. LOVE YOU BRO!
author: Amitesh  Sachan

text: Cards khelte khelte kab char saal beet gaye pata hi nahi chala, first year me bhi bc puri raat cards khele hain aur akhiri dino me bhi cards khelna nahi chhoda. Tu Jahan bhi sath me hota tha, vahan pe alag level bakchodiyan chalti thin, aur tera humour to bhai jabardast hai.. kisi ki bhi dho deta hai. Tere se baat karke hamesha hi maja aata hai, kaafi logical aur rational points hote hain tere aur apna NGO aur Industry vala plan to best of all hai, duniya hila denge. I miss all those moments jab raat bhar fest me bakchodi karte rehte the, cards khelte the, badminton khel khel ke to chappal ghis gayi, MT me jaake subah subah pakaude khate the and so many more. Ab Japan jaake mast mast ladkiyan patana phir hame bhi kabhi Japan ghumana. Jahan bhi raho bakchodi kam nahi honi chahiye.. phir milte hain jaldi hi, you are a very cheerful person, keep your cool. LOVE YOU BRO! ( PS: Dinesh Rocks!! )
author: Amitesh  Sachan

text: Tu to bhai apne batch ka sabse shaktishali launda hai, panje me to bhai koi nahi hara paya tujhe. College ke akhiri kuch mahino me tere sath kafi time bitaya hai. Apan quarantine me bhi sath baith ke khana kha rahe hote the. Sath me badminton khel khel ke pata nahi kitni shuttle cock todi hongi. Tera swag teri muchhon aur tere triceps se ban jata hai. Maja aaya tere se milke, acha insaan hai tu. khata peeta reh, gym jaata reh aur aise hi hamesha panje me sabko harata reh. Phir milenge.. All the Best!
author: Amitesh  Sachan

text: A person who keeps on trying to become better and better everyday. I like your attitude. TA lab se dosti shuru huyi thi aur uske baad kai baar sath me kaam kiya, kitni saari classes me sath baithe, kitne saare courses nikaale. Tere sath kitne baar deep discussions huye hain and tere se baat karke acha lagta tha. You are one of those jinhone mujhe sahi rasta dikhaya hai jab mai bhatakne lagta hun, you helped me to attain my focus. I remember jab apan ghanton badminton khelte rehte the, aur tu bhagta nahi tha varna chappal toot jayegi.. those are some memorable moments. Chaapu to tu hai hi aur aage bhi chapte rehna. Phir milenge, jaldi hi.. LOVE YOU BRO!
author: Amitesh  Sachan

text: Yaad hai apan teeno first year ke summers me mai, tu aur Praveen, sath me baith ke Mahabharat, shaktiman, shhh.. koi hai, dekha karte the. Aur tune mujhe vo serial dikhaya tha sony pe ‘ sajan re phir jhooth mat bolo’ mast lagta tha vo. Tu ek dam mast insaan hai, hamesha cheerful rehta hai aur aas paas valon ko bhi hansata hai. Chaapu to tu hai hi aur aage bhi chapte rehna. Phir milenge, jaldi hi aur phir se bakchodi karenge.. LOVE YOU BRO!
author: Amitesh  Sachan

text: Yadav ji ka beta hai, chumma chipak ke leta hai. First year me tu Bhojpuri movies dekha karta tha pade pade aur Bhojpuri gaane sunta tha par ab launda bada ho gaya hai, ab game of thrones dekhta hai aur English gaane sunta hai. Hamne first year me bahut ladaiyan kari hain, tujhe maar bhi diya tha ek baar but tujhe bhi centre point pe nahi marna chahiye tha. Tera roll number daal ke maine chicken bhi liya hai maine mess me par vahan pe tune mujhe bacha liya tha. Tere ko pareshan karne me maja to bahut aata tha aur tu bura bhi nahi manta par jab tujhe gussa aa jaati thi to phir tu kisi se bhi bhid jata tha. Bahut si bakchodiyan kari hain sath me aur jab bhi milenge phir se bakchodi karenge. Chaapu to tu hai hi aur aage bhi chapte rehna. Phir milenge, jaldi hi.. LOVE YOU BRO!
author: Amitesh  Sachan

text: I want to confess something now.. first year me jab tu kuch din ke liye ghar chala gaya tha naa, kisi shadi ke liye, tab mai mast tere room me tere bed pe baith ke porn dekhta tha, Utkarsh aur Osama to rehte nahi the room pe. aur vo jo daag hain tere gadde pe uska bhi jimmedar mai hi hun.. just kidding, main bathroom chala jata tha. Ek baat to hai.. tu bahut hi seedha bachcha hai, aur dil ka bahut acha hai, kabhi bhi kisi bhi cheej ka bura nahi manta aur hamesha mast rehta hai. Apan ne sath me bahut maje kiye hain aur jab milenge to phir karenge. Chaapu to tu hai hi aur aage bhi chapte rehna. Phir milenge, jaldi hi.. LOVE YOU BRO!
author: Amitesh  Sachan

text: Yaad hai apan teeno mai, tu aur Piyush Samarth, sath me baith ke Mahabharat, shaktiman, shhh.. koi hai dekha karte the. phir milenge.. phir bakchodi karenge
author: Amitesh  Sachan

text: Always cool and calm insaan, baaki phir daaru chadhne ke baad who cares ki kya bakchodi kari. Maja aaya tere se mil ke, I like your nature, very humble. Chaapu to tu hai hi, aage bhi machate rehna, phir milenge.. apna dhyan rakh, Best wishes for you!
author: Amitesh  Sachan

text: Tera room to apne liye picnic jaisa tha, dumb charades khelo, phir bakchodi karo, phir rolls order karo aur bc sabse jyada baar hall gate tak rolls laane ke liye mujhe hi bhej dete the, aur bc rolls khane ke baad do botal aur pakda dete the aur paani bharne bhi mujhe hi jaana padta tha. Tere se milke maja aaya, ek dam mast aadmi hai tu aur kabhi bura nahi manta. Chaapu to hai hi, aur acha insaan bhi hai. aage bhi chapte rehna.. phir milenge dost, All the Best!
author: Amitesh  Sachan

text: Jab first year me mila tha to kaafi seedha aur sanskaari bachcha tha, abhi bhi vaisa hi hai.. vo to launde jabardasti daaru pila dete hain. I remember tujhe uska taste bilkul nahi pasand, par launde phir bhi pilaye jaa rahe the aur tu ek dam ganda sa muh bana ke pee raha tha. Badminton me kafi saare awesome shots dekhe tere, Mishra se to kaafi better the. Aur bhai teri acting.. suicide bomber hamesha tu hi nikalta tha, aur bolta tha ki mai civilian hun, itti bholi shakal banata tha ki Shashank kabhi shak hi nahi karta tha. Dil ka acha aadmi hai tu.. sabki help kar deta hai. Aur chaapu to tu hai hi, Jahan bhi jaana machate rehna. Jaldi hi milenge phir se aur Bhabhi se jarur milvana. Best wishes for you.. LOVE YOU BRO!
author: Amitesh  Sachan

text: First year me jo tune meri panje me beijjati kari thi naa, vo badla mera Hitesh ne pura kar diya, just kidding bro.. I know you are the best. Apan ne fest me kafi maje kiye hain, those are some memorable moments. Aur bhai bhai bhai, badminton me jo tu aadhe court se smash maarta hai na, vo to koi nahi utha sakta, haan par Praveen utha deta tha kabhi kabhi. First year me bhi tu bhola bhala seedha bachcha tha, aur abhi bhi hai.. I like your nature, hamesha help kar deta hai. And believe me, teri hair style me swag hai.. vo jo tu bikhre bikhre baal khade karke rakhta hai. Yaad hai apan ne milke Goku ki painting banayi thi first year me, mast thi vo. Tere sath cards khelne me maja aata tha, aur tere room ke machchhar to bhai, kabhi khatam hi nahi hote the, sath me kitno ka assassination kiya hai apan ne. chhati pe dabba rakh ke mat chalaya kar, harmful rays nikalti hain. You’ve been a very good friend, sath me dhero maje kiye hain. Phir milenge jaldi hi.. LOVE YOU BRO!
author: Amitesh  Sachan

text: Tu shayad pehla hi hai jisse mai kuch hi dino me kafi close ho gaya tha, first year me to tere se hi sabse jyada baat hoti thi. You are an awesome listener.. meri saari kahaniyan, saare chutiyape ek tu hi to sunta tha, samjhata bhi tha, sambhalta bhi tha. Apan ne sath me itne golgappe khaye hain naa ki jab mai akele jaata tha to vo bhaiye puchte the mere se ki vo mote vale bhaiya nahi aaye saath me. Cards khelne me to bhai pro hai apna, sabse jyada baar to tu hi jeet jaata tha aur mafia khelne me bhai alag level maja aata tha, itni bakchodi kisi game me nhi huyi. I miss those moments.. sath me baith ke ipl dekhna, raat me apan jo campus me ghoomte rehte the, subah subah MT me jaake pakaudi khana, chhat pe dumb charades khelna and so many other moments. Yaad hai tune gaanja phhok ke mere pair pe ulti kar di thi, aur mai to bina phooke hi high ho jaata hun. I remember all those night outs jo apan ne NCL me, library me, OAT me aur baaki ke room pe maare hain. Aur Fest me to alag hi bakchodiyan hoti thin, saath me baith ke ladkiyan taadte rehte the ( 3 o’clock, 6 o’clock ). Teri shayri ka fan to pura campus hai, ek dam andar tak hit karti hain, aage to abhi bahut si ladkiyan teri shayri pe ghayal hone vali hain. Dil ka bahut acha aadmi hai tu, sabki help kar deta hai, aur apne kareebi donston ka specially khyal rakhta hai. I’m happy ki apan mile aur itte ache dost bane, aage bhi apni journey aise hi chalti rahegi aur jab bhi milenge phir kuch nayi bakchodiyan karenge. Best wishes for you.. LOVE YOU BRO!
author: Amitesh  Sachan

text: Hall 2 ke paalanhaar, kafi jimmedariyan sambhali hain Hall ki. Yaad hai apan Hall CC me baith ke bakchodiyan pela karte the, deep discussions.. aur bhai, kapurwan ki bitching, mast maje kare hain. Aur jab bhi hall se related kuch bhi kaam hota hai, hamesha tujhe hi bolta tha, CC locked kyun hai, reading room me launde sote rahte hain.. kuch karo, mess me khana acha nhi mil raha etc. ek baat aur, kafi mast aadmi hai tu.. phir milenge jaldi hi, phir koi mudda uthayenge aur phir se bakchodi pelenge.. LOVE YOU BRO!
author: Amitesh  Sachan

text: ‘Laptop taiyyar rakhiyo’, ‘Laptop kidhar hai tera’, ‘Laptop deja’, kabhi mai Lab me hota tha aur phir tera call aa jata tha.. laptop deja, kabhi kabhi to lagta tha ki apni dosti mere laptop pe hi tiki hai. 3rd year me to tu mere room me hi nahi aata tha, bahar se hi bolta tha.. ‘Amitesh, bahar aa’, ek  baat to hai.. jab vo hoti thi to mai room pe hi pada rehta tha, maje to bahut kiye hain maine. Aur bhai tu rolls kitte saare khata tha, roj ka tha bhai tera, tera asar mere pe bhi ho gaya tha aur phir mai bhi daily daily bol deta tha.. ‘ do rolls mere bhi ’. ek baat to mai definitely bol sakta hun.. dumb charades me tere ko koi nahi hara sakta, saala aise aise words guess kara deta hai jisko ham sahi se pronounce bhi nahi kar pate hain, gajab acting karta hai bhai. Agar aadhi raat me ghumne ki baat ho to we are the best company, Bakchodi vale gaane bajate the aur pure campus ka chakkar maar ke aate the. Aur teri technique to bhai gajab hai, jab jyada porn dekhne ka man kare to ‘push-ups’ maar lo, apne aap control ho jayega ( PS: not helpful for me, mere andar bahut havash bhari hai ). Aur gaanja phookne ke baad bhai ki hasi control hi nahi hoti hai, mai to bina gaanja phooke hi tere se jyada hasta rehta tha phir. Ek aur baat.. jab bhi mai pareshan hota tha, ya mujhe samajh nahi aata tha ki kya karun, tab tere se baat karke hamesha sab theek ho jata tha, I’ll miss those nights jab apan ghanton baate karte rehte the, mere saare chutiyapon ki kahaniyan suni hain tune, aur hamesha mujhe samjhaya bhi hai aur sahi rasta dikhaya hai. You’ll always be one of my closest friends jo meri hamesha help karte hain jab mai problem me hota hun. Chaapu to tu hai hi and mujhe pakka bharosa hai ki tu kuch bada karega, papa ka ashirvaad hamesha tumhare sath hai. Phir milenge bahut hi jaldi.. aur ek baar phir ‘shadi me zaroor aana’ movie dekhenge ( # mera inteqam dekhegi ). Best wishes for you.. LOVE YOU BRO! ( PS: If I’m telling you that you are a fucking bitch then keep quiet )
author: Amitesh  Sachan
